name: Nimbus (itch) (WhiteStorm, ShadowF, Patrocle Petitbeurre, blingusdev, Styxcolor, fading_lake, malbanyat | ljusår.studio, ElexXV, PolyFerret)
name_original: Nimbus (itch) (WhiteStorm, ShadowF, Patrocle Petitbeurre, blingusdev, Styxcolor, fading_lake, malbanyat | ljusår.studio, ElexXV, PolyFerret)
description:
Weary from your long journey, you spot some floating islands in the distance. Small robots seem to be living up here in the atmosphere. Take to the skies and meet them all!

Utilize our highly detailed flight system to control your gas expenditure, flap openings, and more :)

Credits:

CodeWhiteStorm, blingus, ShadowF, WraggyGame DesignPatrocle Petitbeurre3D ArtMatt Partin, siphon2D Artmarcixs, StyxcolorSound DesignMalbanyat, Nolen Abel

Font used for logo: "Precious"
by www.boltcutterdesign.net via
